author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The newly revamped Steam Machine has been the talk of the industry since its reveal last week. Unfortunately we don't know the price just yet, but Linus Sebastian over at Tech Tips doesn't think it'll be cheap. Sebastian recalled a conversation in which Valve acknowledged it won't be sold at a 'console price,' i.e., around $500. We here at IGN think it'll sell for—on the low end—$700-800. In other news, Battlefield 6 had a strong debut month, coming in at number one in game sales. Its closest competitor, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, just dropped this month, so it remains to be seem who wins the holidays. And finally, Silent Hill 2 Remake is now available for Xbox Series X after being shadow dropped with a nice 50% discount.

#SteamMachine #Gaming #IGN
title: Steam Machine Might Not Follow Console Pricing Models - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: 007 and Bugatti? Eminem and mom's spaghetti? The Xbox Partner Direct for November 2025 was big for stealth games, and more! Okay, it was Aston Martin in 007 First Light, but it doesn't rhyme well with spaghetti. Along with fan favorite hitmen and agent operatives, Microsoft's third party showcase gave us new looks at the Vampire Survivor spinoff Vampire Crawlers, surprise dropped the psycological horror game, Total Choas, and gave us a brand new look at Eclipe Glow Games' Tides of Annihilation. Here's everything that was announced at the November 2026 Xbox Partner Direct.
title: Everything Announced at the Xbox Partner Direct November 2025

author: IGN
description:
Kirby's latest is finally here! Marking the pink blob's second forray into the racing genre, Kirby Air Riders set players out on epic matches set within the beautiful locales of Dream Land, nustled within Planet Popstar. Here's a full match of Kirby Air Riders, along with a time trial as Meta Knight.

#KirbyAirRiders #Gaming #IGN
title: Kirby Air Riders: A Full Race & Time Trial Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Cleared Hot is available now on Steam Early Access. Watch the fun Cleared Hot launch trailer for this physics-fueled helicopter shooter with tactical flair (and a flexible relationship with gravity). The new Cleared Hot trailer shows chaotic gameplay and more.

#IGN #gaming
title: Cleared Hot - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Sheepdog trailer for this upcoming drama film starring Steven Grayhm, Vondie Curtis Hall, Virginia Madsen, Lilli Cooper, Dominic Fumusa, and Matt Dallas. 

Shot on location in Western Massachusetts, Sheepdog explores the physical and psychological repercussions of trauma, with a focus on Post Traumatic Growth (PTG). It is an uplifting original story, inspired by countless first-hand testimonials about recovery, redemption, and the journey of healing. 

Sheepdog is produced by Steven Grayhm, Lynn K. D'Angona, P. Colin Kane, Matt Dallas, and Jose Martinez Jr. Joe Newcomb, Brint Ryan, and Kory Ryan serve as executive producers.

Sheepdog, directed by Steven Grayhm, will have a limited release on December 17, 2025, and in theaters on January 16, 2026.
title: Sheepdog - Official Trailer (2026)

author: IGN
description:
Just jumping into Where Winds Meet can be a bit overwhelming with the amount of stuff you can do and the amount of menus you have to navigate right from the get go. To that end, here are 10 recommendations of things you should do first right from the start of the game. 

Check out our codes pages for the most up to date information on codes to redeem for free resources: https://www.ign.com/articles/where-winds-meet-codes

And also check out our video on how to complete the Echeoes of Old Battles sidequest: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Et4rqQ9pQdo

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:21 Free Codes
01:02 Get a Mount
01:45 Steal Some Skills
03:07 Free Qi Sheng
03:53 Meet Meow Meow
04:16.Do Sidequests
05:23 Upgrade Your Medicine Chest
05:55 Upgrade Your Gear and Claim Your Rewards
06:42 Pass the First Level Cap
07:25 Increase Your Exploration Level

#WhereWindsMeet #Gaming #IGN
title: Where Winds Meet - 10 Things to Do First

author: IGN
description:
Meet Vendetta in this latest Overwatch 2 trailer and see Overwatch's first melee Damage Hero in action. You think you can outrun the wolf? That’s cute. With her Palatine Fang greatsword in hand, along with her lightning-fast mobility, Vendetta dominates close-range encounters with raw power and unparalleled precision. 

Dash in and demolish your foes using Whirlwind Dash, Soaring Slice, and Projected Edge, all while building attack and movement speed through her Onslaught passive. And when you’re ready to deliver the final blow, her Sundering Blade Ultimate deals severe damage to enemies directly in front of you.

Vendetta will be available during a limited-time Hero Trial from November 26 to December 1, and this Hero officially arrives in Season 20 of Overwatch 2 on December 9, 2025.
title: Overwatch 2 - Official Vendetta: New Hero Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Steam Cozy Quest 2025 sale event is happening now until Nov. 24, 2025. There are hundreds of cozy games on sale with discounts up to 85% off. We've put together this video to showcase fifty-five of the deals available. Whether your favorite cozy style games are puzzles, sims, RPGs, survival, or city builders, there's plenty of options to choose from. 
 
Puzzle fans should check out Umami, a game where you fit wooden blocks together to create towers of food. Another great cozy puzzle game is Unpacking. You follow a young woman through her life by unpacking her possessions each time she moves, unveiling clues to her story. 
 
If you enjoy playing simulation and/or management games, there's always plenty to choose from. In Bear and Breakfast, you play as a bear who starts running a local bed and breakfast. You have to keep your guests happy by updating the rooms and amenities. There's also Flowers and Favours which is the coziest of sims, where you run a floral shop and create beauti
title: 55 Cheap Cozy Games on Steam - Cozy Quest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at 'The Evolution of ARC Raiders' Episode 1 Teaser Trailer for ARC Raiders, the hit third-person action online extraction shooter developed by Embark Studios. Players will get a behind-the-scenes look at the development of Embark Studios' second game and how it evolved into the success it is today. ARC Raiders is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: ARC Raiders - Official 'The Evolution of ARC Raiders' Episode 1 Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at this Exclusive Weapon Crafting Gameplay Video for Of Ash and Steel, a third-person open-world action-adventure game developed by Fire & Frost. Players can engage with the game's in-depth weapon crafting system, allowing for the fine-tuning of sword types, grips, blade type, and more. The video ends with a look at some visceral combat against enemies and dialogue sections in Of Ash and Steel, launching on November 24 for PC (Steam).
title: Of Ash and Steel - Exclusive Weapon Crafting Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Reveal Trailer for Erosion, a time-looping open-world roguelike developed by Plot Twist. Players will explore a post-apocalyptic Wild West where the choices made ripple across decades at a time that can transform factions, townsfolk, and entire regions all the same. Build an arsenal, take on endless waves of enemies, and descend into the Pillar fight after fight to save your daughter before time consumes her for eternity. Erosion is launching into Early Access in Spring 2026 for Xbox on PC, Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Erosion - Official Reveal Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description: Nodding Heads Games announces Raji: Kaliyuga, the sequel to Raji: An Ancient Epic, set six years later. The unsealing of the heavens by the asura warlord Mahabalasura escalates the conflict within the game to a cosmic level. This grand battle encompasses not only mortals but also gods, asuras, and mystical entities. Raji, now a seasoned warrior, and her dreamwalking brother Darsh, journey to the Eternal Summit to save or destroy the universe. Raji: Kaliyuga features dual protagonists: Raji, with acrobatic martial arts and the Trishul, and Darsh, with immense Siddhi powers that control gravity, time, and energy. It introduces customized evasion for Raji and a siddhi-yielding system for Darsh, allowing unique combat styles. The game shifts from an isometric action-adventure to a third-person action-adventure, with Nodding Heads Games committed to delivering a high-quality experience for fans. Raji 2: Kaliyuga is coming to Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox on PC as an Xbox P
title: Raji: Kaliyuga - Reveal Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Spin the wheel and gamble away your money. Wait, scratch that. Even the odds with upgrades to bend things in your favor. Pay off your debts, pee in the urinal, and avoid getting thrown into the pit. Can you beat the digital devil at his own game? Play Clover Pit now on Xbox Series, PC, Cloud, and Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Clover Pit - Console Launch Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at this Zoopunk extended gameplay trailer for the upcoming action RPG prequel to F.I.S.T.: Forged in Shadow Torch. Set decades before the events of F.I.S.T., ZOOPUNK expands the beloved Animal Punk universe, chronicling the turbulent origins of Torch City, an animal metropolis on the brink of revolution. Zoopunk will be available on PC and consoles.

In Zoopunk, players witness the dawn of the First Torch War, when the discovery of the fire seed energy sparks an age of rapid technological progress and catastrophic conflict. As the energy spirals out of control, it awakens mechanical debris into self-aware, unstoppable war machines. Initially created to harness energy, these machines soon adopt violence from their creators, turning against the animals and establishing a mechanical empire bent on domination. With the city in chaos, animals from rival factions must unite to resist this overwhelming force.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Zoopunk - Official Extended Gameplay Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Tides of Annihilation gameplay trailer for this upcoming action-adventure game. The new Tides of Annihilation trailer showcases action-packed gameplay as protagonist Gwendolyn fights against a powerful shape-shifting witch named Tyronoe. Gwendolyn is assisted in the fighting by the spear-wielding Sir Lamorak, a Knight of the Roundtable. The trailer also gives us a peek at the combat system called the Dual Frontline Battle System, as you will be able to control both Gwendolyn and Lamorak. We also get a glimpse at a story element with Tyronoe's creation of a mirror-like Folded Realm. Tides of Annihilation will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Tides of Annihilation - Official Break The Mirror Gameplay Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

description:
The ultimate face-off is coming to HITMAN World of Assassination - Eminem vs. Slim Shady. Infiltrate a surreal environment where doctors, patients, and performers blur into one and take down the crazy part of Eminem. Play for FREE this December with Xbox Series X|S and Xbox on PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Hitman: World of Assassination - Eminem vs. Slim Shady Elusive Target | Xbox Partner Preview

description:
Don the timeworn garb of a plague doctor in Crowsworn, an action platformer where you'll need to uncover the truth behind the curse of Fearanndal. Crowsworn comes to Xbox Series, PC, Game Pass, Steam, PS5, and Switch.

description:
The Aston Martin has long been the vehicle of choice of James Bond, and in 007 First Light, you'll take control of the beautiful Aston Martin Valhalla. 007 First Light comes to Xbox Series, PC, Cloud, Epic, Steam, PS5, and Switch 2 on March 27, 2026.

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Echo Generation 2 announcement trailer for this upcoming sequel to the turn-based RPG adventure. The Echo Generation 2 trailer dives into the story, showcases gameplay, and more. Echo Generation 2 will be available on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud, Xbox Game Pass, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Echo Generation 2 follows the adventures of the first game, putting players now in the boots of Jack as he explores a whole new dimension beyond Maple Town. Lost among the stars, this ordinary dad will meet new quirky allies and face unexpected extra-terrestrial enemies while fighting to find a way back home.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Echo Generation 2 - Official Announcement Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Dave the Diver is available now on Xbox One and Series X|S. It is also available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC. Watch the latest Dave the Diver trailer for this game, which blends exploration, business management sim, and fishing precision. The new Dave the Diver trailer also teases the In the Jungle DLC coming in 2026, which features new biomes, characters, and aquatic encounters.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Dave the Diver - Official Xbox Launch Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
In the heart of a cursed jungle, faith and fear are your only weapons.
Face the unnameable, survive your allies’ madness and unearth what should have stayed buried. Inspired by Lovecraft’s haunting mythos, The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu blends cooperative survival, psychological horror, and exploration in a brutal test of trust and perception. Can you tell what’s real when the jungle itself turns against you? The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu will be available on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox on PC in Summer 2026 as an Xbox Play Anywhere title. Wishlist now!

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: The Mound: Omen of Chthulu - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Save Paris from hordes of demons in Armatus, a third-person roguelite shooter. You are the last remaining supernatural warrior, searching for the Sunless Gate, hidden somewhere within the city. Armatus is coming in 2026 to Xbox Series consoles, Xbox on PC, Xbox Cloud, Steam, PS5, and Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Armatus - Announcement Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview Fall 2025

author: IGN
description:
Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival gets a brand-new trailer showcasing brutal gameplay. Watch the Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival red band trailer for this upcoming visceral, story-driven, single-player, survival horror action game. Step into Hell, see combat, and more in this gory latest trailer. Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival throws you into a battle of wills against the legendary Pinhead (voiced by Doug Bradley) and the malevolent Cenobites for the fate of your immortal soul. Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam in 2026.

Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival introduces a totally new Hellraiser story starring Aidan, who must unlock the dark powers of the mysterious Genesis Configuration puzzle box to save his girlfriend from the terrifying horrors of Hell. Discover a realm of terrors as you take on dark cultist worshippers, sex-crazed deviants, and infernal monstrosities, harnessing unique abilities and a
title: Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival - Official Red Band Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join creative director Omar Bouali at Massive Entertainment for a deep dive into the gameplay of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora's From the Ashes Expansion. Watch the latest Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora From The Ashes DLC trailer to learn more about the story, get a walkthrough of a mission, bow and knife combat, stealth gameplay, enemies, and more from this upcoming expansion for the action game. Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes Expansion will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam) on December 19, 2025.

#AvatarFrontiersOfPandoraFromTheAshes #Gaming #IGN
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Official 'From the Ashes' Expansion Gameplay Walkthrough Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the 'Life in Space' Dev Diary Video for The Expanse: Osiris Reborn, a third-person action RPG set in The Expanse universe developed by Owlcat Games. Players can join former NASA Astronaut and ISS Commander Leroy Chiao alongside Game Design Producer Yuliya Chernenko on the process of using real-time space data and science to portray life among the stars in The Expanse: Osiris Reborn. From spacewalking to weaponry, take a look at how the development team adapted NASA experience into gameplay in The Expanse: Osiris Reborn, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: The Expanse: Osiris Reborn - Official 'Life in Space' Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a deeper look at the various functionalities of the Cosmonaut Assistance Tool (C.A.T) in this video walkthrough, featuring commentary from ROUTINE developer Aaron Foster from Lunar Software. The Cosmonaut Assistance Tool (C.A.T) is an essential piece of hardware, used by the personnel of UNION PLAZA, that will greatly aid in your investigation of the lunar base.  Routine launches on December 4 for Xbox and PC. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/606160/ROUTINE/
title: ROUTINE | Cosmonaut Assistance Tool (C.A.T.) | Developer Walkthrough – IGN First

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the full trailer for Canyons, an upcoming third-person action shooter set in a procedurally generated world. The full Canyons trailer shows more of its dangerous world, gameplay, and gives a peek into its story. Fight mysterious Awakened alone or in co-op for up to 4 players, command giant Crawlers, build your haven, and survive a brutal living world.
title: Canyons - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Anaconda Corp Team Reveal Trailer for Screamer, an anime action racing game developed by Milestone. 

Players can become acquainted with a new Team in the competition with the Anaconda Corp, a group of racers that show no mercy, with power and money being at the root of their racing. Win at all costs with the Anaconda Corp in Screamer, coming in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Screamer #ArcadeRacer

description: Join Chris, the game director on Warhammer 40,000: Speed Freeks as he walks you through the new Creation Mode (aka map editor) for the popular arcade-style combat racing game set in the Warhammer 40k universe. It will be available as a free update on November 27.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Speed Freeks – Creation Mode Walkthrough

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'How Rush Saved Mercenary Day' Bounty Pack 1 Launch Trailer for Borderlands 4, the hit first-person looter shooter game developed by Gearbox. 

Players can now access the first Bounty Pack that sees the salvation of Mercenary Day at the hands of Rush. Attain free cosmetics, guns, and more with a free update to Borderlands 4, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Borderlands4 #ChristmasUpdate
title: Borderlands 4 - Official 'How Rush Saved Mercenary Day' Bounty Pack 1 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'A Safehouse in the Hills' Announcement Trailer for GTA Online, the multiplayer open-world social component to Grand Theft Auto 5 developed by Rockstar Games. 

Players have constructed high rises, luxury suites, and more throughout the 12 years of GTA Online, but soon the ability to create a residence of dreams will be accessible to the player base. Get a quick tease at 'A Safehouse in the Hills', coming in December 2025 to GTA Online.

#IGN #GTAOnline #GrandTheftAuto
title: GTA Online - Official 'A Safehouse in the Hills' Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Corrupted carnival is back. Watch the latest Hunt: Showdown 1896 trailer for the extraction shooter game to see what to expect with Post Malone’s Murder Circus Encore, a new in-game event. 

The event brings new horrors and treasures, including themed Legendary Hunters, weapon variants, Legendary Skins, and in-game activities. The Event arrives alongside the Update 2.6, which brings back some old friends, like the rebalanced and redesigned Shredder weapon, as well as new deadly toys and a unique new feature that will allow players to express themselves like never before. 

Update 2.6 also introduces new Story Challenges. Post Malone's Murder Circus Encore event is coming soon to Hunt: Showdown 1896 on Steam, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Game Pass, and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #HuntShowdown1896 #PostMalone
title: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Official 'Come One, Come All' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond 922, In a surprise move, a new Horizon game is on the...horizon. But its not currently set to be playable on any PlayStation console? Max and Brian break down the upcoming batch of PlayStation mobile titles headed exclusivley to non-PlayStation platforms, their fondness for the Vita, and the new Ratchet and Clank game. Beyond! 

Check out the full epsiode here! - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yuQqJAGsTzQ

This weeks show is Max Scoville, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet
title: New Ratchet & Clank and Horizon Games Announced... But Not For PS5 - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping teaser trailer for this upcoming film starring Joseph Zada, Elle Fanning, Ralph Fiennes, Jesse Plemons, and Glenn Close.

The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping will revisit the world of Panem 24 years before the events of The Hunger Games, starting on the morning of the reaping of the 50th Hunger Games, also known as the Second Quarter Quell.

The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping, directed by Francis Lawrence, opens in theaters on November 20, 2026.

#IGN #TheHungerGamesSunriseOnTheReaping #TheHungerGames
title: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Joseph Zada, Elle Fanning

author: IGN
description: Get a fresh look at Don't Scream Together in this latest trailer for the upcoming cozy 4 player online co-op jumpscare horror simulator about friendship and togetherness. From the developers: "Think of it as a fun haunted house experience with friends, except you are in a huge pitch black forest that might be cursed and may contain serial killers, paranormal activity, or wild animals." The new Don't Scream Together trailer certainly gives a peek into that unsettling aspect and the horror experience you can expect. Don't Scream Together will be available on PC on December 3, 2025. You can wishlist on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2692990/DONT_SCREAM_TOGETHER/
title: Don’t Scream Together - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The SpongeBob SquarePants Pack for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is available now for owners of the Digital Deluxe Edition as part of the Season Pass, and as a standalone purchase. Check out the latest Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds trailer for the racing game to see SpongeBob and Patrick in action. The SpongeBob SquarePants Pack includes SpongeBob SquarePants and Patrick Star as playable characters, a Patty Wagon Vehicle, a Bikini Bottom Themed Course, new SpongeBob SquarePants-inspired music tracks, and six different emotes per character. 

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC, and Nintendo Switch.
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Official SpongeBob SquarePants Pack Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Khuzaits vs Nords Naval Battle Gameplay Showcase for Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - War Sails, an upcoming naval combat expansion to the hit open-world strategy RPG developed by TaleWorlds Entertainment. Get a look at over 8 minutes of intense nighttime battle between the Nords and Khuzaits, making use of fire pots launched from heavy-ship ballistas to ignite enemy sails and hulls. Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - War Sails is launching on November 26 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).
title: Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord War Sails - Official Khuzaits vs Nords Naval Battle Gameplay
